original_text: Then the city wall was broken through, and the whole army fled. They left the city at night through the gate between the two walls near the king’s garden, though the Babylonians were surrounding the city. They fled toward the Arabah,
korean_text: 그 성벽이 파괴되매 모든 군사가 밤중에 그 성에서 나가 두 성벽 사이 왕의 동산 곁문 길로 도망하여 갈대아인들이 그 성읍을 에워쌌으므로 그들이 아라바 길로 가더니

sentences.original_text: Then the city wall was broken through
They left the city at night
through the gate between the two walls
though the Babylonians were surrounding the city
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌로니아 사람들이 성을 포위하고 있었음에도 불구하고
